original_text: He covered the two doors of olivewood with carvings of cherubim, palm trees, and open flowers. He overlaid them with gold and spread gold on the cherubim and on the palm trees.
korean_text: 감람나무로 만든 그 두 문짝에 그룹과 종려와 핀 꽃을 아로새기고 금으로 입히되 곧 그룹들과 종려에 금으로 입혔더라

sentences.original_text: He covered the two doors of olivewood
with carvings of cherubim, palm trees, and open flowers.
sentences.korean_translation: 그룹과 종려나무와 활짝 핀 꽃 조각으로 덮었습니다.

sentences.original_text: and spread gold on the cherubim and on the palm trees.
